channel.description: Recent content in management on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Making Decision As A Team Member
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Democracy in a Nutshell Sure we all heard of democracy. Mostly, this term appears in erhm, election? However, from what I understand, democracy is maintained by giving decision-making power to the people.

item.title: Adjust The Way We Work In Basecamp Style
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Being in a remote team is dope. Manage your own stuff, remove the time and cost of commuting, select your work ambiance, and got equipped with all types of supporting tools.

item.title: Go The Extra Mile
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: A couple days ago, I was asked if I were ever a product person, what would I do to make the best out of it.

item.title: Account
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Planning Many people would say in order to have a good plan; you need to write out all vibrant details.
